item.title: Edwina add a quote by Richelle Mead
item.description: "No," Dimitri interrupted gently. He moved his face toward mine, our foreheads nearly touching. "It won't happen to you. You're too strong. You'll fight it, just like you did this time." "I only did because you were here." He wrapped his arms around me, and I buried my face in his chest. "I can't do it by myself," I whispered. "You can," he said. There was a tremulous note in his voice. "You're strongâ€”you're so, so strong. It's why I love you." -- Richelle Mead

item.title: Edwina add a quote by Toni Morrison
item.description: "What difference do it make if the thing you scared of is real or not?" -- Toni Morrison
